title: BRIEF-FCMB Group Delays Filing Of Q3 2019 Unaudited Results
text:
BRIEF-FCMB Group Delays Filing Of Q3 2019 Unaudited Results

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 11:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-FCMB Group Delays Filing Of Q3 2019 Unaudited Results Oct 7 (Reuters) - Fcmb Group PLC : * WILL NOT FILE ITS NINE MONTHS (Q3 2019) UNAUDITED RESULTS THE PERIOD ENDED 30 SEPTEMBER 2019 BY THE DUE DATE OF 31 OCTOBER * DELAY IN RESULTS DUE TO THE COMMENCEMENT OF THE INTERIM AUDIT OF THE COMPANY'S COMMERCIAL BANKING SUBSIDIARY * CONSOLIDATED THIRD QUARTER 2019 RESULTS OF FCMB GROUP PLC, BE RELEASED ON THE NIGERIAN STOCK EXCHANGE ON OR BEFORE 29 NOV Source text for Eikon: ID: Further company coverage: FCMB.LG

BRIEF-FCMB Group Delays Filing Of Q3 2019 Unaudited Results
description: BRIEF-FCMB Group Delays Filing Of Q3 2019 Unaudited Results
